location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting the extract of a petition made by Buxee Khanum on 31 July regarding her claim to the estate of her late husband, Aga Mahomed, forwarded by Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government at Bombay.
